title: The only reason Dominion flopped in my opinion
body:
Was because ranked dominion never came out.

It was promised, it was promised, it was promised. But it never came! I used to spam dominion games back when it was in its prime, maining talon bot and winning about 90% of my games. I would go on to do so for a year or so. I wanted more of a challenge, I wanted my scores to be recorded like they were in ranked. Dominion ranked was the first thing to actually interest me quite a bit in league, and that was why I started playing ranked 5v5's. Because...

_It never came.
_
Ranked never arrived, or was even tested. I mean it was a pretty fun mode. But without ranked the community lost competitive interest. It became a silly pass time but playing ARAM or Hide&Seek or Catch the Teemo or something like that was far better.

I even remember getting into ranked 3v3's, that shit was amazing. I did it with my two friends who played league and were at my level because we didn't have enough for a team. It was hard with the lack of players for the 3v3 game, but it was still very fun and interesting. Again though, coming to OCE, the lack of any 3v3's ranked system made me lose interest. You can polish that shit up as much as you like but my only interest is to play competitively. I like the challenge. I know many others do as well.

I hope you learn for the future riot and I hope this creates discussion on the next moves for riot, because I haven't seen any posts of it (Dominion's ranked) and I can't post on NA anymore cause obviously my acc is moved...

Anywhoo. Goodluck kids :)

-Warri, posting for the first time since the boards died.

replies.body: I have waited in queue for 10 minutes today for ranked 5's even. You have to accept that the oce server doesn't really have the player base and I think mobas in general are not as popular as they used to be.
yeah but regardless of oce's lack of community, NA had the population for ranked systems and they were neglected
